What is the most interesting aspect of MRA2 for you?
Monster Rancher Metropolis: The Cafe: Town Hall (Polls): MRA & MRA2 Polls: What is the most interesting aspect of MRA2 for you?
By GoldenBoy on Sunday, February 9, 2003 - 12:33 pm:

I love the traits. They frustrate the heck out of me, by popping up, disappearing, changing, etc. but they make monster behavior more interesting.

By MmmBeefy on Monday, February 10, 2003 - 05:26 pm:

Hmm...For me it's a tie between traits and age...Who hasn't had a monster get too old the week before an important tourney? This aspect encouragest players to manage as much as possible, pushing us to do better.

By Infernus on Sunday, February 16, 2003 - 10:56 am:

I like the traits and the pure breed specials. All that combining and raising just to unlock one set of specials, it makes everything so much harder.

By Cheese_monster on Tuesday, March 4, 2003 - 06:50 pm:

no more finally finding that c.d. you needed
and it not workin!!!!!!!!! WHOOHOOOO

By lazy guy on Tuesday, August 19, 2003 - 09:49 am:

I like the new monsters.

By Pattongeneral on Tuesday, August 19, 2003 - 11:48 am:

I like the fact that you can choose which monster you want when you combine. I also like the tablet thing. I hate not being able to have a monster becasue you don't have the CD, or don't have enough money to get the CD. The book/encyclopedia thing rocks too.

By Orange Dragon on Friday, September 5, 2003 - 07:39 pm:

I like how you can get legendary monsters.

By Urag the Garu on Saturday, September 6, 2003 - 08:54 am:

A bit pointless to say that I like Garu.
But i do.

By ZinBro on Thursday, May 20, 2004 - 02:25 pm:

My monsters get to old for anything. Thats what drives me to do better, its also why I working on two super monsters...

By foxman on Wednesday, December 21, 2005 - 10:09 pm:

what super monsters

By foxman on Wednesday, December 21, 2005 - 10:09 pm:

?

By Swezlon Uno on Wednesday, July 12, 2006 - 08:54 am:

To tell the truth MRA2 is my favorite of the MR games. I dont excatally know why it just is.

By At the comp. on Wednesday, July 12, 2006 - 10:25 am:

Defenitly the blue-S, but I also liked all the work it took to unlock all the monsters, like collecting those darn orbs.

By Phantom_Ninja on Wednesday, July 12, 2006 - 12:25 pm:

I like the fact that it keeps some of the cooler monsters from Monster rancher 3 and 4, while it also brings back some of the cooler breeds from Monster rancher 1 and 2, such as Gali, Monol, and Doodle.

By Mra2 Rancher on Thursday, July 20, 2006 - 04:03 pm:

I like the fact that you don't need to use CDs to get monsters. I also like the different ways of unlocking monster breeds
